name: 1GAW - Week 2
description:
Note: This is a small prototype just for the sake of practicing game programming. I made this in less than a week.

This is a Pac-Man clone that I made as part of 1 Game a Week. I tried to make the moment to moment gameplay feel like Pac-Man, while also adding in the teleport mechanic. Unfortunately I ran out of time and energy to implement audio and the wave-based AI, but I hope this stripped down version is still fun for people to play!

Source code: https://github.com/Reccy/1GAW_2

Controls:

WSAD / Arrow Keys to move

Touch the power pellet to teleport around the room in a clockwise direction
